Function Documentation

void RTC_ClockSourceConfig ( RTC_SRC_Enum  Source)

Select the RTC timer clock source.

Parameters:
Source,:specify the clock source of RTC and backup domain.
  • RTC_SRC_LSI : Low speed internal clock.
  • RTC_SRC_LSE : Low speed external clock.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 225 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

u8 RTC_GetFlagStatus ( void  )

Return the RTC flags.

Return values:
RTC_STSregister value. This parameter can be any combination of following:
  • 0x0 : No flag set
  • 0x1 : Count flag
  • 0x2 : Match flag
  • 0x4 : Overflow flag
Note:
RTC_SR is read clear.

Definition at line 314 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

FlagStatus RTC_GetOutStatus ( void  )

Return the RTCOUT level mode flag.

Return values:
SETor RESET
Note:
Reads RTC_CR action will clear ROLF flag.

Definition at line 371 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

u16 RTC_GetPrescaler ( void  )

Return the RTC prescaler setting.

Return values:
Theprescaler value. It is powered by 2 and max.is 32768.

Definition at line 195 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

void RTC_IntConfig ( u32  RTC_INT,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the specified interrupt source.

Parameters:
RTC_INT,:Selection of Wakeup source. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • RTC_INT_CSEC : Assert interrupt at counter counting
  • RTC_INT_CM : Assert interrupt at counter compare match with CMP register
  • RTC_INT_OV : Assert interrupt at counter overflow
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 128 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

void RTC_LSESMConfig ( RTC_LSESM_Enum  Mode)

Select the LSE startup mode.

Parameters:
Mode,:specify the LSE startup mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • RTC_LSESM_NORMAL : Little power consumption but longer startup time.
  • RTC_LSESM_FAST : Shortly startup time but higher power consumption.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 352 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

void RTC_OutConfig ( RTC_ROWM_Enum  WMode,
RTC_ROES_Enum  EventSel,
RTC_ROAP_Enum  Pol 
)

Configure the RTC output function.

Parameters:
WMode,:specify the RTC output waveform mode This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • RTC_ROWM_PULSE : Pulse mode
  • RTC_ROWM_LEVEL : Level mode
EventSel,:specify the RTC output event selection This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • RTC_ROES_MATCH : Compare match selected
  • RTC_ROES_SECOND : Second clock selected
Pol,:specify the RTC output active polarity This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • RTC_ROAP_HIGH : Active level is high
  • RTC_ROAP_LOW : Active level is low
Note:
This function will disable RTC output first.

Definition at line 335 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

Parameters:
Compare,:Between 0x0 ~ 0xFFFFFFFF
Return values:

Definition at line 240 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

void RTC_SetPrescaler ( RTC_RPRE_Enum  Psc)

Configure the RTC prescaler.

Parameters:
Psc,:Value of RTC prescaler. This parameter can be one of following values:
  • RTC_RPRE_1
  • RTC_RPRE_2
  • RTC_RPRE_4
  • RTC_RPRE_8
  • RTC_RPRE_16
  • RTC_RPRE_32
  • RTC_RPRE_64
  • RTC_RPRE_128
  • RTC_RPRE_256
  • RTC_RPRE_512
  • RTC_RPRE_1024
  • RTC_RPRE_2048
  • RTC_RPRE_4096
  • RTC_RPRE_8192
  • RTC_RPRE_16384
  • RTC_RPRE_32768
Return values:
None

Definition at line 184 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.

void RTC_WakeupConfig ( u32  RTC_WAKEUP,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the specified wakeup source.

Parameters:
RTC_WAKEUPSelection of Wakeup source. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • RTC_WAKEUP_CSEC : Waken up by counter counting.
  • RTC_WAKEUP_CM : Waken up by counter compare match with CMP register.
  • RTC_WAKEUP_OV : Waken up by counter overflow.
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 264 of file ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c.
